item.description:
340-partial fn:format-number: Specifying decimal format

The PR introduces an additional $format argument to fn:format-number, which allows you to override decimal formats with custom properties.

Next, we may need to clarify if the current specification already allows processors to provide custom decimal formats (https://github.com/qt4cg/qtspecs/issues/340#issuecomment-1968856655). Itâ€™s not part of this PR.
